Articles.Content:
I've got a little story that will expand over time, but don't know where the best forum is the best to post it in.

Roland
If you go to the KSP Fan-Works subforum, there is a specific heading called "Writing". That sounds like the best place to me. Good luck on your story!
There will be once again Mission Report subforum as one of the devs said

Thank's.

I'll post my story later, but I've been posting it on it's own facebook Page as a backup just in case anything goes wrong with the forums again.

Roland
